item.title: New York Airport Limo Service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: At Legends Car Service we've built a reputation for excellence by delivering the area's most efficient and reliable airport pick-ups.  From arrivals to departures, your travel experience will be defined by our commitment to quality customer care and punctual service.  No matter what your transportation needs, we can supply cars, vans, buses or limo services through our trained staff of professional chauffeurs that will reach any airport destination safely and securely. Simply provide our customer representatives with your flight details and leave the rest to us. Depending on your preference, our professional drivers are available to meet passengers in the arrivals lounge (meet & greet)or curbside upon arrival while assisting you to our vehicle to ensure the finest transportation service available. Legends Covers the Following Airports: 1. John F. Kennedy Airport (JFK) 2. Newark Airport (EWR) 3. LaGuardia Airport (LGA) 4. MacArthur Airport (ISP) 5. Teterboro Airport (TEB) 6. Westchester Airport (HPN)   How to Arrange for an Airport Pick-Up: 1. Simply call us anytime; we are conveniently open twenty-four hours a day seven days a week, to book an advanced reservation with one of our professional operators. 2. Go on line and choose the “Online Reservation” option. 3. Call us for an immediate pick up on arrival at the airport. (Getting a car: based upon availability *Less preferred option*)   Airport Pick-Up Methods: 1. Inside Pick-Up (Meet & Greet): Our chauffer will go inside the terminal and wait for you at the baggage claim area for (domestic flights) or at the custom exit for (international flights), carrying a LEGENDS sign with your name on it, he will also assist you with your luggage and escort you to the vehicle located at the parking lot. 2. Outside Pick-Up (Curbside): After you place an advanced reservation, you will be given a confirmation number. We will monitor your flight through our state of the art computer systems, confirm your arrival times and dispatch the car to the airport area accordingly. Upon collecting your luggage, call our toll free 1(888)LEGENDS (534-3637). Give the operator your confirmation number or your name, the dispatcher will then provide you with the car number and direct you to the designated limousine pick-up area. You will normally meet your driver within five minutes.   Airport Procedures and Policies: Inside Pick-Up (Meet and Greet) 1. Your flight will be monitored and confirmed. 2. A car will be dispatched in advance. 3. Your driver will be waiting for you by the baggage claim area (for domestic flights) and at the custom exit (for international flights) holding a LEGENDS sign with your name on it. 4. If you can’t find your driver inside, please call 1 (888)LEGENDS 1(888)534-3637. Passengers leaving without calling will be charged. 5. It is the passenger’s responsibility to notify us if your flight is changed or if you miss your flight. 6. Cancelation must be at least two hours before arrival time for LGA, JFK, or EWR airports and three hours for TEB, HPN or ISP airports. 7. Passengers are not responsible for flight delays however we are not responsible for airlines updating their arrival times. 8. Complimentary waiting time is provided as follows: 30 minutes from the arrival time on all domestic flights 45 minutes on all international flights Outside Pick-Up (Curbside) 1. Flights will be monitored and confirmed. 2. A vehicle will be dispatched in advanced and on stand-by for you at the airport. 3. Upon collecting your luggage call toll free 1(888)LEGENDS 1(888)534-3637, give your confirmation or your name and legends’ dispatchers will direct you to a curbside point located right outside your terminal where you will meet your driver within a few minutes. 4. If you do not call us to meet your driver after 45 minutes, we will try to contact you on the telephone number provided. If we still fail to reach you, the car will be dismissed and you will be billed for a “No Show”. *Please note when reserving a stretch limo, a suv, or 13 pass van, the inside pick up is the only option available.* *Please note that a credit card is required for all airport pick-ups to secure your reservation and it is your choice whether to use the card for payment at the end of the trip or you can pay cash. Legends will obtain an authorization approximately 25% above the estimated quote to cover any additional charges such as: waiting time, additional stops, gratuity, tolls, etc. Also please note, if you are using a debit card, there will be a temporary hold of the estimate quote plus 25% for approximately three to five business days until the actual charge is processed.   Contact us from the airport: Main Line: 1(718)788-1234 Toll Free: 1(888)LEGENDS 1(888)534-3637 Toll Free: 1(800)788-2119

item.title: Brooklyn Car Service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: You’re one step closer to premiere Brooklyn car service with Legends Limousine.  Punctuality and performance are the hallmarks of Brooklyn’s finest transport service with availability throughout the borough, as well as the tri-state region.  We are proud of our reputation as one of New York City’s premiere limousine resources and our dependability is second to none.  Enjoy reliable transport throughout Park Slope, Boerum Hill, Brooklyn Heights and more when you take advantage of Legends Limousine versatile car services. Local residents who expect the finest Brooklyn car service have become loyal clients at affordable rates, making Legends Limousine one of the most established limousine service providers throughout Red Hook, Sunset Park and Fort Greene. In addition to our superior dispatch technology, our Brooklyn car service offers simple, effective and secure personal and corporate accounts that provide our clients with the protection and convenience they’ve come to expect from an industry leader. Client satisfaction and safety is our main concern.  That’s why Legends Limousine is proud to offer drivers and vehicles that are 100% licensed and insured.  No comprehensive Brooklyn car service would be complete without our impeccable safety record and 20 years of seamless service.  Our staff is made up of the city’s most savvy and experienced chauffeurs whose knowledge of the tri-state area is unmatched.  Their wealth of experience has made Legends Limousine among the most respected Brooklyn car service for decades.   We offer a wide range of transportation services are specifically designed with you in mind so every arrival and departure can be tailored to meet your changing needs no matter what the occasion.  From special events to corporate travel to business meetings, Legends Limousine is proud to be your premiere Brooklyn car service.

item.title: LaGuardia Car Service & Limousine Service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Tucked away in a convenient section of Queens, LaGuardia Airport has continually increased its airline carrier capacity and Legends Limousine has responded accordingly. Our professional drivers regularly offer limo transportation services to this popular airport and our loyal customers enjoy consistently on time pick ups. Located just minutes outside of Manhattan, LaGuardia airport is an ideal transportation hub for travelers flying domestically and our airport limo services have been called upon to ensure quality results for countless clients in the tri-state area. You can trust our seasoned chauffeurs to make arrival and departures a simple, stress-free process. At Legends Limousine, we guarantee top tier customer service and strive to always meet your transportation needs.
In preparation for a trip, numerous challenges can present themselves. Between the vagaries of New York traffic and construction on major highways, driving to LaGuardia airport is an exercise in patience. In addition, parking a car at the airport for either long term periods or simply an hour can add up to hefty fees that are often overlooked when calculating trip expenses. Ultimately, the exorbitant hidden costs of driving to LaGuardia and parking at the airport greatly outweigh the reasonable price of enjoying an on-time arrival with Legends Limousine.
As a leading provider of LaGuardia airport car services, we are proud to offer customized client care that is designed to fulfill your transportation needs. If you prefer, our drivers will meet you inside with a placard specifying the client's name. For the height of convenience, your chauffeur will be glad to lend assistance in ensuring all your luggage pieces are packed carefully in the car before departing the airport. Whether you're on your way to a business meeting or simply arriving home after a vacation, Legends Limousine will deliver you to your desired destination in a timely and affordable manner.
Relax in comfort and style while leaving the driving to the professionals. If you're flying out of LaGuardia airport in a large group, there is no more convenient way to travel than with our numerous vans that can accommodate oversize parties. Between luggage, people and pets, even families find our vans to be the perfect solution to the pre-trip rush. Just pile in with room to spare as you arrive on time and hassle-free using our established LaGuardia airport limo services. Call us today to discover how convenient LaGuardia limo service can be with our professional staff meeting your transportation needs.

item.title: JFK Limousine Service & Car Service to JFK
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
At Legends Limousine, you’ll discover the difference that a passion for quality and a commitment to service can make. Our airport transportation capabilities ensure that every client enjoys an on-time departure and punctual pick up. Worrying about missed flights or waiting for arriving passengers is a thing of the past when you experience our impeccable airport service in JFK limos. Whether your needs include drop off or pick up, Legends Limousine is proud to be your partner in reliable transportation services. There's no need to waste time in cell phone waiting lots or squander gas while circling the area's numerous terminals. Let our professional drivers streamline the process with our dedicated airport car services.
We service some of the nation’s most in-demand transportation hubs and have earned a reputation for excellence year in and year out through our JFK airport limos. Other companies promise punctuality but fail to deliver reliable results during rush hour periods or through heavy construction zones. Legends Limousine is the area’s premiere New York airport limousine service because our drivers are intimately familiar with all the issues affecting your trip. When timing is important, our passengers can rest assured that their journey to JFK airport will be stress-free and punctual.
As one of the country’s most popular flight destinations, JFK Airport is an increasingly complex collection of terminals boasting both international and domestic carriers as well as numerous highway routes that can intimidate and confuse visitors. Many travelers find it daunting to navigate this maze of buildings and airline hubs successfully without the aid of experienced airport service experts like Legends Limousine. Our seasoned drivers are trained to deliver quality results every time. They are backed by the Legends Limousine guarantee and are well-versed in getting clients to their gate in a safe and timely manner.
Don’t leave your travel plans to chance. Trust the professionals at Legends Limousine to take the hassle out of flying. Our JFK limo service is renowned for its accurate and professional results. Taking into account travel time, traffic, alternate routes and time of day, Legends Limousine drivers consider a multitude of factors when planning your route. These unpredictable aspects of JFK airport transportation are easily controlled through the experience of our established drivers who put safety and timeliness first. This attention to detail is what you’ve come to expect from an industry leader and ensures an on time arrival for our valued passengers.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Newark Car & Limousine Service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As a bustling transportation hub, Newark airport is a prime destination for international travelers from across the tri-state area. Enjoy the benefits of Newark airport limo service with Legends Limousine. Our transportation capabilities will surpass your needs while delivering results you can rely on. For business excursions or family vacations, the period of time leading up to an important trip is full of details that must be addressed and deadlines that can't wait. Our trained professionals remove the headache of travel arrangements with just the touch of a button. One call to our service center puts you in touch with a customer care representative who works closely with clients to develop a travel plan that will ensure on time arrivals and departures from Newark airport.
From start to finish, our dedication to quality service comes through at every stage. Our drivers are committed to comprehensive and courteous service. This means a safe, comfortable ride with the professional touch of an industry leader. When you're searching for reliable limo service to Newark airport, look no further than Legends Limousine where punctual transportation promises a stress-free travel experience. Over the years, we've trained countless talented drivers and transported scores of loyal clients throughout the New York City and New Jersey areas. Their continued patronage is the highest testament to our lasting success as a valued airport limo service provider.
Leave the hassle at home and let Legends Limousine take care of your transit needs whenever your flight calls for Newark airport limos. Keeping our passengers satisfied is our top priority and we deliver results with every ride. Arrival and departures from Newark airport are easily within reach at an affordable price when you call our toll free number and speak with a helpful representative. For clients interested in Newark limos, we have a diverse array of cars available to suit your needs including Lincoln Towncar vehicles. In addition, we also offer clients access to a vast inventory of alternative transportation options such as vans, SUV's and more. No matter what style or size vehicle your trip demands, Legends Limousine is proud to offer a wide selection of Newark airport limo services.

item.title: Terms of Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: 1. Terms By accessing this web site, you are agreeing to be bound by these web site Terms and Conditions of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this web site are protected by applicable copyright and trade mark law. 2. Use License a. Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Legends Limousine's web site for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not: i. modify or copy the materials; ii. use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial); iii. attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Legends Limousine's web site; iv. remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or v. transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server. b. This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Legends Limousine at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format. 3. Disclaimer a. The materials on Legends Limousine's web site are provided "as is". Legends Limousine makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Further, Legends Limousine does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its Internet web site or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site. 4. Limitations In no event shall Legends Limousine or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption,) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Legends Limousine's Internet site, even if Legends Limousine or a Legends Limousine authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you. 5. Revisions and Errata The materials appearing on Legends Limousine's web site could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Legends Limousine does not warrant that any of the materials on its web site are accurate, complete, or current. Legends Limousine may make changes to the materials contained on its web site at any time without notice. Legends Limousine does not, however, make any commitment to update the materials. 6. Links Legends Limousine has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its Internet web site and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Legends Limousine of the site. Use of any such linked web site is at the user's own risk. 7. Site Terms of Use Modifications Legends Limousine may revise these terms of use for its web site at any time without notice. By using this web site you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use. 8. Governing Law Any claim relating to Legends Limousine's web site shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York without regard to its conflict of law provisions. General Terms and Conditions applicable to Use of a Web Site.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: As part of our ongoing dedication to developing a secure online resource for users, Legends Limousine provides this Privacy Policy (“Policy”) to ensure the privacy of individuals that access our website, http://www.legendslimousine.com (“Site”). Use of the Site constitutes an agreement that you are bound by this Policy throughout the duration of your time on the Site. THIS POLICY IS A LEGAL AND BINDING AGREEMENT BETWEEN YOU THE USER AND LEGENDS LIMOUSINE and applies to use of the Site as well as our privacy protocols in relation to the Site. In addition, users will be subject to any supplementary terms regarding specific provisions of the Site, which also govern your use of the Site, including Conditions of User and Website Terms . Should you fail to agree to this Policy, users are instructed to cease their use and access of the Site in order to avoid contravening the Policy. Legends Limousine reserves the right to modify or augment this Policy without prior approval and at will. Continued access to the Site after any of the aforementioned modifications are applied creates an implicit acceptance of the Policy after the modifications. Therefore, responsibility to confirm acceptance of this Policy on a regular basis falls to the user. This Policy was last updated on January 21, 2010. As part of our commitment to security, Legends Limousine has gone to considerable lengths to ensure your payment information is processed in accordance with our standards of confidentiality, accuracy, and security. Under the Fair Credit Billing Act, your credit card company is prevented from holding you liable for more than $50 of fraudulent credit card charges. Should your credit card be used without your permission, you must make a claim and immediately notify your credit card company. Your credit card company will be able to inform you if you will be held responsible for this $50 liability fee. As a company that utilizes secured sockets layer (SSL) technology, Legends Limousine ensures the privacy of your personal data and payment information. This technology encrypts or scrambles your personal information (including your name, delivery and e-mail addresses, and credit card number and security code) before we receive it, thereby nearly eliminating the chance that anyone outside of Legends Limousine can gain access to it. Please be advised that some older Internet browsers and some firewalls are not equipped to allow communication through secure servers and will not enable you to connect to our server securely. You may choose to connect to the secure server via our standard servers, but your password will not be encrypted. If you have already securely saved billing information to your account, you can still order securely using your saved information. If you submit new billing information via standard servers, it will not be encrypted. Users can detect whether they are in secure mode if a "lock" or a "key" icon is displayed in the lower left-hand corner of your browser window. You can also check by looking at the address bar on top of your Internet browser. This line will typically show the first characters as https://, when a secure connection has been established, rather than http://, which indicates a connection that is not secured. If you prefer, you may place your order by telephone. Simply call Legends Limousine at 1.888.LEGENDS. To ensure increased security, we employ cutting edge back-end systems, and we limit the access given to our employees over your personal data and billing information. No third party has the ability to receive any personal customer information. Upon use of the Site, Legends Limousine automatically gathers specific data on your usage habits. Included in this information is your domain name and IP address, your browser version, your operating system, the URL you came from, the pages you visit within the Site, and the URL to which you go upon leaving the Site. This information is used in an aggregate form only, by Legends Limousine to monitor the Site’s performance, services, traffic trends, features and browser version. Through the use of “cookies” which are segments of information that may be placed on your computer by a website for the purpose of developing and improving your user experience, Legends Limousine will never use cookies to access information that is unrelated to the Site. Use of cookies includes personalizing your user experience and offer you customized content by indicating which site areas are the most popular. While most browsers automatically accept cookies, users can modify this setting to reject cookies. You can be assured that Legends Limousine will never sell, rent, or exchange your personal data. Should you wish to stop receiving notifications or simply prevent Legends Limousine from using e-mail address, you may send an e-mail to Legends Limousine at unsubscribe@legendslimousine.com. While Legends Limousine aims to safeguard the privacy of each user, the company cannot (and does not) guarantee the security of any personally identifiable information submitted in relation to your use of the Site (or use of the services, or otherwise). Any such action is undertaken at your own risk. Continued access to the Site constitutes your consent to the gathering and use of your personal information by Legends Limousine as demonstrated in this Policy. You acknowledge that you are aware of security and privacy limitations including but not limited to: (1) the global accessibility of the Site on the Internet; (2) the limitation of security, privacy, and authentication measures and features in this Site; (3) the risk that data or information on the Site may be subject to eavesdropping, sniffing, spoofing, forgery, spamming, “impostering”, tampering, breaking passwords, harassment, fraud, electronic trespassing, hacking, nuking, system contamination (including viruses, worms, and Trojan horses) causing unauthorized, damaging, or harmful access and/or retrieval of information and data on your computer; and (4) the risk that data or information on the Site, may be subject to other security or privacy hazards, may not reach its destination, or may reach an erroneous address or recipient. Safeguarding the online privacy of children is a top priority for Legends Limousine. Therefore, minors under the age of 18 may not use or access this Site. Should a child under 18 elect to use or access this Site, he (or she) should always ask a parent for permission before doing so. Personal information about the minor or their family will never be asked for or knowingly gathered by Legends Limousine. Because Legends Limousine is unable to prevent minors from accessing the Site, the responsibility to supervise minors in their online visitation activities rests with parents and guardians. Under New York law, the user and Legends Limousine have assented to this Policy within the State of New York, for all purposes. Accordingly, all services that are furnished to the user on (or through) the Site are deemed to be furnished within the State of New York. All such services are being furnished by Legends Limousine through its personnel and computer equipment located within the State of New York. All disputes arising out of, under, or in connection with this Policy (including without limitation, their validity, interpretation, performance, or breach) will be adjudicated exclusively in the federal or state courts located in (or having jurisdiction over) New York County, New York. This Policy and its validity and effect will be interpreted under, and governed by, the laws of New York, without regard to its conflict of laws and provisions. You expressly consent to the jurisdiction of such courts over you. You expressly waive any claim of forum non conveniens. You agree to reimburse Legends Limousine for its legal fees and expenses of instituting (or defending) a lawsuit by (or against) you. This Policy (and any other operating rules or terms posted on the Site (including, without limitation, the Terms of Use) constitute the entire agreement between Legends Limousine and you, and supersede all previous written or oral agreements between Dial 7 Car & Limousine Service, Inc. and you. No action (or inaction) by Legends Limousine may be construed as a waiver of this Policy (or any part). If any of the provisions of this Policy are held to be unenforceable by a court having competent jurisdiction, the remainder of this Policy will continue in full force and effect. Legends Limousine fully cooperates with law enforcement agencies in identifying those who use our services for illegal activities. Legends Limousine reserves the right to release information to law enforcement agencies about users who Legends Limousine believes are in violation of this Policy. Legends Limousine also reserves the right to report to law enforcement agencies any activities that Legends Limousine believes to be unlawful and the identity of those who may be responsible.

item.title: Conditions of Service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: These Conditions of Service (hereafter referred to as “Conditions of Service”) constitute a binding, legal agreement between the user and Legends Limousine covering user Services (“Services”) provided by Legends Limousine. User is required to review these Conditions of Service in their entirety prior to use. By using the Services, users agree to be bound by these Conditions of Service and will also be subject to any additional terms posted on our website (“Site”) located at LegendsLimousine.com These additional terms include (without limitation) the Terms of Services and the Privacy Policy. Without expressed agreement with the following Conditions of Service, users are instructed to discontinue using the Services. Legends Limousine reserves the right to modify or augment these Conditions of Service without notice and at will. Continued use after such amendments represents your acceptance of the Conditions of Service as modified or augmented. The responsibility to review these Conditions of Service at regular intervals falls to the user. These Conditions of Service were last updated on January 19, 2010 SUPPLEMENTARY CHARGES Supplementary charges may be incurred as a result of any modifications to your trip after pick-up. User is required to solicit an updated price from the driver or the dispatcher before proceeding continuing. PRICING At the discretion of Legends Limousine, all advertised rates are subject to change without notice. Please note that rates may also rise during holiday seasons or special events. RATE QUOTE User should be aware that the price estimate before departure is an estimation based on information that is subject to change and was provided at the time of the reservation. Additional fees for tolls, gratuity, idling time and added stops are not included in the estimate and may increase your rate. TOLL FEES Given the unpredictable nature of urban traffic patterns, road conditions and weather events on the days of your transportation, your driver retains the authority to evaluate the most efficient and secure route to your destination. This may include the use of a toll road in order to guarantee your safe and timely arrival. Responsibility for any tolls throughout the trip rests with the passenger. User will be subject to the full toll rate and discounted rates are not applicable. Tolls will be added to your final bill upon arriving at your destination. Please note that should a driver be prevented from returning to headquarters without paying a toll, round trip tolls will be charged to the user. Approximate tolls: • Manhattan to LaGuardia Airport - $7.50 • Manhattan to JFK Airport - $7.50 • Manhattan to Newark Airport - $15.00 GRATUITY AND TIPING Gratuity is left to the preference of the passenger when traveling in a Sedan, Luxury Sedan, or Mini-Van. However, stretch limousines, SUVs, or 13-passenger vans require an obligatory gratuity of 20%. IDLING TIME Levied at 15 minute intervals, time spent idling or waiting is charged at the hourly rate for a particular vehicle. These charges may apply in the event of passenger arriving late to a pre-determined pick-up as well as any time spent idling at additional. Legends Limousine allows for a specified courtesy waiting time grace period on roundtrip airport pick up however, charges may apply once the complimentary period is over. Should user experience flight delays for airport pick-ups, Legends Limousine will not charge for idling time. ADDITIONAL STOPS Estimated rates do not encompass any additional stops on the user’s trip. Without explicit prior approval, phone reservation terms do not include additional stops. The rate calculation for extra stops considers the distance added from the route between the original pick-up and final destination. For a precise quote, contact 718-788-1234. AIRPORT PARKING FEES Please be aware that Legends Limousine offers a meet and greet service within the airport terminal that requires an additional parking fee determined by the New York and New Jersey Port Authority. CANCELATION POLICY Failure to observe the cancellation policy will result in a credit card charge. Users must notify a reservationist of a trip cancelation at least 2 hours in advance for transportation anywhere within New York City’s 5 boroughs including New York City airports and areas extending four hours outside New York City. FAILURE TO ARRIVE FOR PICK UP In the event that Legends Limousine is unable to reach the user or a representative 15 minutes after the scheduled pick-up time, using the contact information provided on the reservation form, then the service will be abandoned on grounds of user absence. Failure to arrive for pick up without prior notification may lead to a charge. RESERVATION CHANGES Legends Limousine requires that all reservation modifications be submitted at least three hours prior to pick-up. Should a change be requested less than three hours prior to pick-up, such modifications cannot be guaranteed and the subsequent cancellation may result in a full or partial charge to the customer. CREDIT CARD POLICY Legends Limousine accepts major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Discover, and requires users to supply the credit card number in advance for pre-approval. This process is intended for pre-approval purposes only and does not constitute payment for the trip. Using a credit or debit card results in a temporary hold of 150% of the quoted fare to be placed on the card. This hold will secure the estimated total including tolls, gratuity, additional stops, and idling time. This hold is released when payment is complete within 5-7 business days after the service is rendered. The credit card in question must be presented to the driver at the time of pick-up and users should be aware that the driver reserves the right to request additional identification to ensure the validity of the card. All signatures and information must match before the card will be accepted as payment. Throughout the service and during the course of the trip, users may not leave the vehicle, for any reason without a preliminary signing of the credit card slip. Failure to do so will result in the full fare being charged against the card. CREDIT CARD PROCESSING It takes approximately 5-7 business days after the Legend Limousine services have been rendered to process user credit card payments with the date of processing appearing on user credit card statements. All credit and debit card transactions are handled in a safe, encrypted format by a secure server to ensure Legends Limousine and our customers’ maximum security, and the assurance that your information stays confidential, private, and safe. We urge users to review out Privacy Policy for more information. VIRTUAL CREDIT CARDS As a policy, Legends Limousine refuses to accept online-only, virtual credit cards or any other type of "single-use" card number security product or one-time use credit card number that may be provided by credit card companies for online use and assumes no responsibility or liability in connection with the use of such products. RATES AND BILLING CORRECTIONS Auditing may occur on rates after order completion. In the event of mathematical errors, changes will be made to show the actual tolls, parking fees, additional stops and idling time. AFFILIATE SERVICE POLICY Legends Limousine reserves the right to use affiliates to provide Limousine and Ground Transportation services as necessary to meet the needs of our users. FLEET IMAGES Images of the Legends Limousine fleet that are viewed on the official company website may vary from the actual vehicle. LOST OR DAMAGED ITEMS Lost or damaged property left in vehicles is not the responsibility of Legends Limousine as our staff members strive to locate items that have been abandoned in our fleet. After 30 days, all items become property of Legends Limousine. In the event that a user has left a personal item in one of our vehicles and wish to retrieve it, you can report it in our Lost & Found department or call 718-788-1234. Upon locating said item, Legends Limousine reserves the right to levy a delivery fee for returning found property, charged at full travel rates. EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY Legends Limousine and its Affiliates are not responsible for missed flights, changed plans or losses incurred due to circumstances that are beyond our control. These circumstances include but are not limited to, causes beyond its reasonable control, acts of God and Nature, acts of terrorism, travel congestion, road closures, accidents, flight and weather delays. Legends Limousine’s liability for all causes whatsoever arising shall be limited to your actual damages, in an amount not to exceed the sum of all charges paid by you for the fare. LEGENDS LIMOUSINE SHALL HAVE NO LIABILITY WITH RESPECT TO ITS OBLIGATIONS UNDER THIS AGREEMENT OR OTHERWISE FOR CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES EVEN IF IT HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. THIS LIMITATION APPLIES TO ALL CAUSES OF ACTION OR CLAIMS IN THE AGGREGATE, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION BREACH OF CONTRACT, BREACH OF WARRANTY, INDEMNITY, NEGLIGENCE, STRICT LIABILITY, MISREPRESENTATION, AND OTHER TORTS. EACH PARTY, INCLUDING YOU, THE USER, AND LEGENDS LIMOUSINE UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THESE REMEDIES, EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS ALLOCATE THE RISKS OF SERVICE NON-CONFORMITY AS AUTHORIZED BY THE UNIFORM COMMERCIAL CODE AND/OR OTHER APPLICABLE LAWS. LEGENDS LIMOUSINE’S FARES FOR SERVICES REFLECT, AND ARE SET IN RELIANCE UPON, THIS ALLOCATION OF RISK AND THE EXCLUSION OF CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES AND LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT. THE FOREGOING LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY APPLY WITHOUT REGARD TO ANY INTENTIONAL MISCONDUCT OR GROSS NEGLIGENCE BY LEGENDS LIMOUSINE. PET POLICY Legends Limousine requires prior notification of pets in order to allow our staff to provide proper accommodations. Failure to notify a reservationist that you are traveling with a pet enables the driver to refuse to transport the pet. Please note, all animals must remain on a leash or animal carrier while inside the Legends Limousine vehicle. Animals surpassing 25 lbs must ride in a minivan or van, while service dogs are exempt from this provision. GENERAL PROVISIONS You, the user, and Legends Limousine Service have hereby agreed to these Conditions of Service within the State of New York, for all purposes. All disputes arising out of, under, or in connection with these Conditions of Service (including without limitation, their validity, interpretation, performance, or breach) will be adjudicated exclusively in the federal or state courts located in (or having jurisdiction over) New York County, New York. These Service Terms and its validity and effect will be interpreted under, and governed by, the laws of New York, without regard to its conflict of laws provisions. You expressly consent to the jurisdiction of such courts over you. You expressly waive any claim of forum non conveniens. You agree to reimburse Legends Limousine for its legal fees and expenses of instituting (or defending) a lawsuit by (or against) you. These Conditions of Service (and any other operating rules or terms posted on the Site (including, without limitation, the Privacy Policy) constitute the entire agreement between Legends Limousine and you, and supersede all previous written or oral agreements between Legends Limousine and you. No action (or inaction) by Legends Limousine may be construed as a waiver of these Conditions of Service (or any part). If any of the provisions of these Conditions of Service are held to be unenforceable by a court having competent jurisdiction, the remainder of these Conditions of Service will continue in full force and effect. Copyright © 2010 Legends Limousine Service. All rights are reserved.

item.title: First Class Corporate Limo Service New York
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Business car services NYC experts on call

At Legends Limousine, we understand that your time is valuable. That’s why we’ve specially designed our corporate benefits package to address your needs. By optimizing your transportation experience, our corporate services succeed where other companies fail. From booking to departure, your travel needs are simplified and streamlined as a result of our renowned automated systems. As a corporate account member, you’ll enjoy: - Easy to use and secure online reservation system - Simplified and personalized account management - Electronic billing capabilities - Dedicated hotline and account executive - Event coordination - Streamlined voucher system - Ability to monitor user activity Apply Now

item.title: Apply for An Account
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
With Legends Limousine corporate accounts, you’ll never have to wonder about immediate availability or billing uncertainties. Scores of local clients count on our expertise and reasonable pricing to ensure their timely transportation needs. We deliver convenience and professionalism at every turn with our popular corporate accounts. This service allows our regular clients to enjoy our state of the art, streamlined online reservation system, account management and vouchers. Our corporate accounts are just another example of Legends Limousine’s ongoing commitment to customizing your transportation experience.
You’re about to experience the unparalleled convenience and luxury that comes with Legends Limousine corporate accounts. Clients can download the corporate account application and mail it to the address below. Along with your application, please include a photo copy of the following:
- Front and back of the credit card you’d like to be held on file - Cardholder’s valid government issued ID.
We look forward to serving you regularly. Please contact our Corporate Sales Manager for further information at 1.888.LEGENDS (534.3637).
Download Corporate Account Application Here
Mail to the following address: Legends Car Services 88A 4th Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11217

item.title: Lost and Found
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
If you suspect you have left an item in one of our vehicles, please contact us at (718) 788.1234. If the driver finds the item and can bring it back to you, there will be a surcharge to be paid to the driver at the time of the delivery. The charge is based on the distance between you and the driver at the recovery time. If the driver is not able to immediately return the lost item to you, the driver will bring that item to our office. You can then, contact our customer service department to discuss how you may retrieve that item. You may pick it up from our office located at, 88A 4th Avenue Brooklyn, NY 11217, use messenger service, arrange for FedEx to pick it up, request to have it sent to you by mail, etc. (Not paid for by Legends)
Or you can fill out and submit our lost and found form on the bottom of this page. We will do our best to locate your lost property and contact you with the status.
Please note:
1. Legend is not liable for lost items left behind in any of our vehicles left by passengers but we will do our best to locate and recover your item. 2. It may take 2-3 business days for us to locate your item and bring it back to our office. 3. Our lost and found department is open Monday through Friday between 9a.m.- 5 p.m.

item.title: Service Report
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: In our continuous effort to improve our service we encourage our passengers to express any dissatisfaction with any member of our staff by filling out our service report. We assure you that all reports will be investigated and proper action will be taken.

item.title: Customer Survey
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: At Legends Limousine, customer care is our top concern and your opinion counts. We welcome your feedback and invite you to fill out the short client survey below. This valuable information will assist us in ensuring the highest quality control for our services. Thank you for taking a moment to help further our commitment to bettering your customer experience.

item.title: About Legends Limousine
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As a premiere New York City transportation provider, Legends Limousine is proud to service the tri-state area for over 20 years. Our trained professionals are committed to the highest levels of safety while our customer service representatives ensure you’ll receive top tier treatment at every turn. Punctuality and safety go hand in hand at Legends Limousine. Our passengers enjoy on-time arrivals with the reliability and comfort you’ve come to rely on.
Arriving on time and stress-free is simpler than ever with our easy to use online reservation system. By prioritizing your convenience, we’ve established Legends Limousine as an industry leader among our valued clients. From large group outings to airport transportation, our trained and licensed drivers are always on hand to make your travel dreams a reality. Countless clients enjoy our dependable limo service for a variety of occasions including weddings, corporate retreats and a celebratory evening out. At Legends Limousine, we guarantee affordable and safe travel with none of the hassles associate with driving in New York.

item.title: Group Transportation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Imagine getting together with a group of friends without ever having to worry about coordinating people, deciphering directions, finding parking or refraining from mixing alcohol and drinking. This can be a reality with Legends Limousine group transportation. Travel around the city in high style and ultimate comfort while enjoying the company of a large group of your closest friends in the same vehicle with ease. We offer a wide range of vehicles from minivans for mid-size groups to 13 passenger vans for larger parties depending on your space needs. In addition, consider your next business event with Legends Limousine. Always on hand to improve your travel experience, we specialize in accommodating groups in excess of 13 by providing a fleet of mini buses and coach buses at your disposal. From corporate excursions to company retreats, surpassing your expectations is our top priority.
Bring your closest confidantes with you when you travel with Legends Limousine. Our services include stress-free group transportation that takes the guesswork out of the fun day you’ve planned. With a professional driver to chauffer your group around New York City, you’ll never have to be concerned with finding the right directing or getting lost in America’s most thriving metropolis. Instead, you can relax with the peace of mind that comes with decades of industry experience.
Another major problem that visitors to New York City often contend with is finding parking, particularly if they plan to move around Manhattan during the day. With Legends Limousine, you’ll discover the difference that streamlined, professional group transportation makes. You’ll never deal with tickets, gas or parking issues throughout your excursion. Instead, your group of friends and family will have the chance to experience the Big Apple as it was intended. With our group transportation services, you’ll also be liberated to enjoy an evening on the town without worrying about drinking and driving issues. New York City is the place for excess and excitement, and Legends Limousine will help you enjoy the experience responsibly in a vehicle of your choosing.

item.title: Hourly Car Service or Limousine Service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: With Legends Limousine, you'll receive comfort and style by the hour. We offer the finest in convenience with our hourly limo service by putting the power back in the passenger's hands. You can direct the driver to locations across the city with reassurance, knowing your car will be waiting to travel wherever life takes you. Our hourly service gives you the freedom to modify your schedule during the course of your outing, whether it's business or sightseeing. As always, Legends Limousine offers the flexibility to tailor your travel excursions according to your unique needs. Discover the convenience of minute-by-minute luxury when you choose our unparalleled hourly service.

item.title: Your Dream New York Prom Limousine
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Every Spring season, Prom is celebrated as a treasured rite of passage for young people and Legends Limousine service is proud to be there every step of the way. We provide a multitude of cars, SUVs and limousines to choose from so prom partiers will enjoy the most comfortable and stylish ride in the tri-state area. For an event as special as Prom, arriving in style means more than just choosing the right dress. It means getting together with friends in the luxury and comfort of a Legends Limousine vehicle to make the night unlike any other. Impress your date or simply enjoy the luxury of chauffeured driving with our extensive inventory of popular vehicles. Surprise your high schooler with a gift that will make their evening secure, fun and memorable with our numerous vehicle choices. They’ll stand out in our fleet of stretch Hummers or bring along a group of friends in our popular stretch Escalade vehicles. From the classic Rolls Royce to the cutting edge Mercedes Benz, we have your Prom needs covered. For parents, Legends Limousine offers priceless peace of mind through our chauffeur services by promoting the safest means of travel on Prom night. With late night celebrations stretching into the evening, reserved transportation is always the best way to ensure your teen will enjoy a safe Prom. They’ll be no need to worry knowing our trained and experienced drivers are behind the wheel.

item.title: Round Trips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
For your next event, from sports games to a night on the town, save yourself the stress of driving in and out of the city by enjoying Legends Limousine’s roundtrip transportation service. You deserve the worry-free ease that comes with quality service and reliable results. No more finding a ride home or paying exorbitant parking rates only to find your car was damaged during your time in the city. Instead, trust Legends Limousine to keep you arriving on time and in style with our signature round trip transportation service.
Countless clients around the tri-state area take advantage of our punctual and professional transport options that mean coming into the city for an evening is a streamlined and affordable occasion. We put your nightlife and sporting events dreams within reach with our roundtrip service that ensures you won’t late and will arrive refreshed. No more rush hour headaches and unpredictable traffic patterns to contend with. Our drivers are experienced in the vagaries of city transport and understand that a safe, secure and comfortable ride is the top priority. Roundtrip service includes a chauffeur waiting until you’re ready to leave. You can leave the mad rush for a taxi behind forever with our convenient roundtrip service.

item.title: Sightseeing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our unique sightseeing tours give you the freedom to customize your experience in New York City, making every excursion a one-of-a-kind adventure with your very own driver. Clients who enjoy our sightseeing services have the opportunity to see Manhattan as never before: up close and completely personalized. Choose from a set route that will take you around the island in a day or simply tailor your trip to your unique preferences.
Clients will enjoy having full access to a beautifully appointed vehicle throughout the course of their sightseeing excursion. The driver will allow for as many stops as you’d like and passengers may spend as much time as desired at each location around the city to ensure your sightseeing experience exceeds your expectations. Interested in the hottest spots you’ve seen on TV or just want indulge in the finest offerings the city has offer? Either way, Legends Limousine can create and deliver the perfect sightseeing itinerary for your needs.
Radio City Music Hall, Central Park and the Empire State Building all await your arrival with a Legends Limousine tour. Don’t pass up the world’s most exclusive shops and restaurants. You can create your own customized tour complete with stops at the most in-demand eateries and popular fashion meccas. There’s no need to miss out on all the city has to offer. Just call Legends Limousine to schedule your very own sightseeing excursion designed with you in mind. We you contact our professional staff, you’ll leave behind the hassle and uncertainty of planning an action-packed day in one of the world’s premiere destinations. Enjoy the flexibility that comes with knowing your transportation needs are taken care of so you can relish every moment in the Big Apple.

item.title: The Perfect NYC Limo Service for a Night on the Town
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We also provide Long Island limo service, New Jersey limousines and car services across the metropolitan area
Legends Limousine has been making special events even more unforgettable for over 20 years in the tri-state area. Our reliable transportation service has been a part of countless celebrations from business affairs to family functions. We are proud to be a trusted partner in graduations, Superbowl events and bachelor parties across New York, New Jersey and Connecticut. Give yourself the gift of relaxation knowing you’ll reach your destination safely and affordably without the hassles of everyday driving.
Between gala events and high profile parties, getting you there in style has never been more important. We understand that punctual and reliable chauffeur service is a vital component to making any special occasion go smoothly. That’s why we offer custom tailored service packages that take the hassle out of planning. Imagine event planning without the added stress of transportation logistics. We make this dream a reality through trustworthy service and unprecedented value. Our service packages will keep you within budget and on-time for all your special occasions. Never again will you battle traffic or struggle with directions only to arrive late and frazzled. Legends Limousine ensures the finest in transportation services so you can focus on what’s really important.

item.title: New York Wedding Limousines
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
From classic styling to modern appeal, every wedding demands the right vehicle to complete its unique theme. We put the finishing touches on any ceremony with reliable, on-time transportation at Legends Limousine. Providing vintage flourishes and undeniable class, the Phantom Rolls Royce and Jaguar models are perfect ways to arrive in style, along with a host of different options available. With impeccable service and value-conscious pricing, reliable transportation is the first think brides and grooms can check off their list when you ride with our certified and insured drivers.We are proud to provide solutions to your pressing wedding transportation needs. Leave the transportation to the experts with Legends Limousine. We have earned a sterling reputation as one of the region’s leading wedding transport experts and invite you to explore the many ways we can add comfort and convenience to your wedding celebration.
One of the most common challenges to planning a wedding is ensuring reliable transportation for the many guests and family members that require airport shuttle service. Legends Limousine has 20 years of experience in coordinating the transportation needs of large volumes of visitors for weddings and related events. We provide on-time, comfortable driving services between the airport, hotel, wedding ceremony and reception to make your special day run smoothly. By managing the arrival of guests and family members, you’re freed up to relax and enjoy the day- a one-of-a-kind gift for the special event.
